script.name: Import Class Suffixes
script.description:
This script imports class suffixes from a CSV file.
File format:
    SubjectCourseNbrTypeSectionSuffix
    ALG101Lec1001
    ALG201Lec1001
    ALG201Lab1001A
    ALG201Lab2001B
    ALG201Lab1a001A
    ALG201Lab2a001B

script.name: Export Class Suffixes
script.description:
This script exports class suffixes in CSV format. Only classes with not empty class suffix are exported.
File format:
    SubjectCourseNbrTypeSectionSuffix
    ALG101Lec1001
    ALG201Lec1001
    ALG201Lab1001A
    ALG201Lab2001B
    ALG201Lab1a001A
    ALG201Lab2a001B
